    <div class="grid-9 region region-content region-content-article" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Setting the stage for MSI &amp; Worlds</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20170207/2384/setting-stage-msi-worlds" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund odd clearfix" id="node-article-2384--2">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Setting the stage for MSI &amp; Worlds" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 02-07-17</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20170207/2384/setting-stage-msi-worlds">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20170207/2384/setting-stage-msi-worlds">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/2017_CompetitiveEventUpdate_header_1920x1080%20%281%29%20%281%29.jpg?itok=9uFt6bXg" width="700" height="394" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-a6421405-1a12-098d-1198-3b0213b727f9">Pack your bags and book your flights,<em> League of Legends</em> pro esports <a href="http://event.na.lolesports.com/en_US" target="_blank">heads for some all new destinations during MSI and Worlds in 2017</a>.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-a6421405-1a12-098d-1198-3b0213b727f9">First the Mid-Season Invitational decamps for Brazil, <a href="http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/2017-mid-season-invitational-update" target="_blank">check out the announcement</a> to read the sites we&rsquo;re stopping by. While you&rsquo;re there, you can also peep the locations the World Championship will visit when it&rsquo;s <a href="http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/2017-world-championship-update" target="_blank">held in China for the first time</a>.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-a6421405-1a12-098d-1198-3b0213b727f9">While we&rsquo;re thrilled to visit the home fields of some of <em>League&rsquo;s </em>most passionate fans for the first time, it&rsquo;s not just the scenery that&rsquo;s changing.</span></p>
<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a6421405-1a12-098d-1198-3b0213b727f9">We&rsquo;re excited to be making some format changes and breaking new ground with all thirteen regions participating at both premiere international competitions! <a href="http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/2017-international-events">Dig into the details here</a>, and don&rsquo;t forget to stop back and visit <a href="http://lolesports.com" target="_blank">lolesports.com</a> for more pro <em>League </em>action.</span></p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field field-name-field-topic field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/topic/esports" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">eSports</a></div></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"></nav>
    
		<a href="/news" class="view-all">All Articles</a>
      </div>
</article>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>      </div>
</div><aside class="grid-3 region region-sidebar-first" id="region-sidebar-first">
  <div class="region-inner region-sidebar-first-inner">
    <div class="block block-views block-related-articles-block block-views-related-articles-block odd block-without-title" id="block-views-related-articles-block">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="view view-related-articles view-id-related_articles view-display-id-block view-dom-id-736b1dfb062dc564f67be732d153598d">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-empty">
      <div class="view view-featured-news-blocks view-id-featured_news_blocks view-display-id-block news-grid view-dom-id-676895dff26ace5e7f078762bb370647">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    
 <div class="ds-1col node node-article new-tag-item view-mode-featured_teaser clearfix ">
	<a class="news-teaser" href="/articles/20170315/2390/designing-experiences-beyond-game" title="Designing Experiences Beyond the Game"><span class="glass"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_thumbnails-grey/public/content/article/images/primary_thumb/demacia-silvermere_newsriver.jpg?itok=tb8y7tAE" width="400" height="400" alt="" /></span><span class="base"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_thumbnails/public/content/article/images/primary_thumb/demacia-silvermere_newsriver.jpg?itok=oyDXNuyv" width="400" height="400" alt="" /></span><span class="teaser-meta"><span class="headline">Designing Experiences Beyond the Game</span></span></a></div>

             glb-grid glb-grid-24 "><div id="glb-topo" class="glb-topo"><style type="text/css">.header-navegacao,.header-navegacao     .header-navegacao-color {
      color: #009DDB;

      width: 24px;
      height: 24px;

      padding: 0 24px;

        width: 30px;
        height: 30px;
      }

        padding: 0 72px;  
      }

      .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 142px;  
      }

m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>

class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">NOVIDADES DO JA</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon                 title="VDEOS DA RBS TV"
                href="http://g1.globo.com/sc/santa-catarina/videos/"
                data-track-click="clique | titulo">
                VDEOS DA RBS TV
                
            </a></h3></header><section class="gui-card-content card-de-videos-content"><div class="nano"><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/sc/santa-catarina/jornal-do-almoco/videos/v/aniversario-de-florianopolis-tem-shows-gratuitos-bolo-e-mostras/5746729/"

                    RBS Notcias: Interdio de escolas deixa alunos em Sombrio sem aula
                </p></div></a></div></div></section></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-296a15d6-e654-4a3b-9f54-9a1e1cbe8605');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos no foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><section data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="lista" class="gui-card card-lista"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><p class="">quadro desaparecidos</p></h1></header><section class="gui-card-content"><div class="nano"><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://redeglobo.globo.com/sc/rbstvsc/fotos/2014/06/veja-fotos-das-pessoas-desaparecidas-mostradas-pelo-jornal-do-almoco.html" title="Veja as fotos das pessoas desaparecidas mostradas pelo JA (RBS TV/Divulgao)" class="card-lista-item-wide-link"><div class="card-lista-item-wide gui-image-hover"><figure data-track-click="clique | thumb imagem | posicao 1"
